body: Hi Eli, I think you're right. The path is already set in batch file so if other components work this should also work. Let's try this: If you go to the folder that the sky is generated (c:\ladybug\skylib\basedOnIlluminanceLevel) is my case. There should be a batch (*.bat) file in the folder. Right click on bat file and open it as a text file. 1. Remove first line which is **@echo off**. 2. Change the last line from ****exit**** to ****pause.**** 3. Now if you save and close the file and double click you should see a window similar to this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/mAhJbRiQDqFcylwaWcz4aiPSp8mVXZjRt2MCG8u5D6WtfhTc8aKBk1XNyI9LeUgQ8NJ6WVnWBRHfwvAzKW76r6qIg1dgx2UR/watchTheSky.JPG) We should be able to see the error there.
